name: mouse
objective: Pair a Bluetooth mouse an use it
description: User should be able to pair a mouse and use it.
pre_condition:
- Bluetooth technology is enabled on the test device
- The mouse is charged and powered on. The mouse is visible by other Bluetooth devices

steps.description: Click on the '+' button to add a new device
steps.expected: Bluetooth wizard appears and searching for devices. Available Bluetooth devices appear

steps.description: Select the mouse device to pair
Click on the 'Continue' button and wait a moment
steps.expected: Bluetooth wizard displays 'Successfully set up new device <device name>'. The added device appears in the Devices field of Bluetooth panel.

author: zingile

name: keyboard
objective: Pair a Bluetooth keyboard an use it
description: User should be able to pair a keyboard and use it.
pre_condition:
- Bluetooth technology is enabled on the test device
- The keyboard is charged and powered on. The keyboard is visible by other Bluetooth devices

steps.description: Click on the '+' button to add a new device
steps.expected: Bluetooth wizard appears and searching for devices. Available Bluetooth devices appear

steps.description: Select the keyboard device to pair
Click on the 'Continue' button and wait a moment
steps.expected: Bluetooth wizard displays 'Successfully set up new device <device name>'. The added device appears in the Devices field of Bluetooth panel.

author: zingile
